琵嘴鴨.definition: (bird species of China) northern shoveler (Spatula clypeata)

琵琶.definition: pipa, Chinese lute, with 4 strings, a large pear-shaped body and a fretted fingerboard

琵琶行.definition: Song of the Pipa Player, long poem by Tang poet Bai Juyi 白居易[Bai2 Ju1 yi4]

琵鷺.definition: spoonbill (wading bird of the family Threskiornithidae)
